Title: The Bostonians
Cast: Christopher Reeve, Vanessa Redgrave, Jessica Tandy, Madeleine Potter, Nancy Marchand, Wesley Addy, Barbara Bryne, Linda Hunt, Charles McCaughan, Nancy New, Jon Van Ness, Wallace Shawn, Peter Bogyo, Martha Farrar, Dusty Maxwell
Plot: A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future. 19th-century Boston woman dedicated to the suffrage movement, meets a faith healer's daughter, a Mississippi lawyer also has eyes for the young woman. Written by Joyce Kavitsky <Kavitsky@erols.com>
Keywords: lawyer, feminist, post civil war, southerner, suffragette
Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
Actors: Christopher Reeve, Vanessa Redgrave, Jessica Tandy
Description: Directed by James Ivory.  With Christopher Reeve, Vanessa Redgrave, Jessica Tandy, Madeleine Potter. A Boston feminist and a conservative Southern lawyer contend for the heart and mind of a beautiful and bright girl unsure of her future.
